description: Ensures equal representation of different perspectives or viewpoints on a topic. This decorator promotes fairness and comprehensiveness by giving proportional attention to multiple sides of an issue, avoiding bias toward any particular position.

parameters.name: perspectives
parameters.description: Number of different perspectives to include

parameters.name: structure
parameters.description: How to structure the different perspectives

parameters.name: equal
parameters.description: Whether to strictly enforce equal word count for each perspective

examples.description: Basic balanced view of a controversial topic
examples.usage:
+++Balanced
Discuss the pros and cons of nuclear energy.
examples.result: Presents the benefits and drawbacks of nuclear energy with equal attention and detail given to both perspectives

examples.description: Balanced presentation of multiple perspectives in comparative structure
examples.usage:
+++Balanced(perspectives=4, structure=comparative, equal=true)
What are the different views on artificial intelligence regulation?
examples.result: Provides a balanced side-by-side comparison of four different perspectives on AI regulation, with equal word count allocated to each viewpoint
